name: HandwashingMusicBox
0:
”Alexa, open Handwashing Music Box”
”Alexa, start Handwashing Music Box”
”Alexa, launch Handwashing Music Box”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: handwashing music box
Developer Terms of Use
des: Tired of humming Happy Birthday or the Alphabet Song while you wash your hands? Use Handwashing Music Box instead. The Center for Disease Control recommend washing your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds to remove most germs and pathogens. Use Handwashing Music Box to let you know how long you should scrub your hands.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
